name: Catch Dude!
description:
Catching apples is a lot harder than one might think!

Help Catch-Dude catch fruit as they fall from the trees, but don't forget to dodge the bombs! Apples are mandatory to catch, but cherries are optional and increase your score multiplier.

---

This game is 100% playable in the browser, installing it just allows you to play it offline (or screw around with the data, if that's your thing).

The original online home of this game can be found here over at the official PICO-8 website.

This is my first *real* game, so it will clearly be a bit rough around the edges. I hope that it's still enjoyable nonetheless!

Please provide any feedback, positive and negative, about the game, as that will help me grow as a developer! 

If an installation does not work, please let me know so I can attempt to fix it!

(Also, special shoutout to Elia and their article on how to format PICO-8 games for html, whose article can be found here. Many thanks!)
